org.universAAL.utilities.api - package org.universAAL.utilities.api
Contains the most basic helper utility for using the universAAL simplified API.

Contains raw helper classes to deal with Context concepts of universAAL.

Contains low level helper classes to deal with Context concepts of universAAL.

Contains normal helper classes to deal with Context concepts of universAAL.
org.universAAL.utilities.api.service - package org.universAAL.utilities.api.service
Contains raw helper classes to deal with Service concepts of universAAL.
org.universAAL.utilities.api.service.low - package org.universAAL.utilities.api.service.low
Contains low level helper classes to deal with Service concepts of universAAL.
org.universAAL.utilities.api.service.mid - package org.universAAL.utilities.api.service.mid
Contains normal helper classes to deal with Service concepts of universAAL.
org.universAAL.utilities.api.service.top - package org.universAAL.utilities.api.service.top
Contains full advanced helper classes to interact with Services of universAAL.
org.universAAL.utilities.api.ui - package org.universAAL.utilities.api.ui
Contains raw helper classes to deal with UI concepts of universAAL.
org.universAAL.utilities.api.ui.low - package org.universAAL.utilities.api.ui.low
Contains low level helper classes to deal with UI concepts of universAAL.

terminate() - Method in class org.universAAL.utilities.api.UAAL
Closes all universAAL wrapper classes created by this universAAL helper until now (by calling their .close() method) and eliminates them.

U

UAAL - Class in org.universAAL.utilities.api
This is a central helper class that allows you to interact with universAAL from a very high level, use its main features, and doing it with few or no extra classes and little code.
UAAL(ModuleContext) - Constructor for class org.universAAL.utilities.api.UAAL
This constructor just assigns the Module Context: the rest of resources used by this class are not initialized.
uri - Variable in class org.universAAL.utilities.api.service.Value
Holds the URI of the argument.
UtilActuator - Class in org.universAAL.utilities.api.service.mid
This is a helper class for those who want to use the typical services of an on/off actuator (get status, set on and off) over an ontological service.

UtilPublisher - Class in org.universAAL.utilities.api.context.mid

UtilUICaller - Class in org.universAAL.utilities.api.ui.mid
This abstract class can be extended to create a UICaller that automatically registers its own Service Callee with the typical Main Menu "Start" service, that will be called by the Dialog Manager when the user requests the application form the Main Menu.
